attributes.action: Keep the Union Jack flags up all year round, particularly in Regents Street
attributes.additional_details: Place more Union Jack flags around the UK, in particular streets such as Regents Street to make everyone proud of our country.
attributes.background: The government and Parliament should discuss this to inject patriotism into the country and to remind the country of our past and current struggles.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726537
